message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SY, cs.AI 

This paper discusses security risks in a permission-based security model used in Android and Blackberry, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also proposes an approach to detecting permission gaps using static analysis, which involves software engineering (cs.SE) and programming languages (cs.PL). Additionally, the paper discusses the need for platform-specific knowledge, which relates to systems and control (cs.SY) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) in terms of developing automated tools for detecting permission gaps.
